RefMode.Name: Cortex_Memory_Protection_Unit_Control_Settings
RefMode.Comment: Cortex Memory Protection Unit Control Settings
RefMode.Group: Cortex Memory Protection Unit Control Settings

RefParameter.Name: MPU_Control

PossibleValue.Comment: Background Region Access Not Allowed + MPU Disabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Access Not Allowed + MPU Enabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Privileged accesses only + MPU Disabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Privileged accesses only + MPU Enabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the control mode of the MPU (in case MPU USED) during hard fault, NMI, FAULTMASK and privileged access to the default memory

RefParameter.Name: MPU_Control

PossibleValue.Comment: Background Region Access Not Allowed + MPU Disabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Access Not Allowed + MPU Enabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Privileged accesses only + MPU Disabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers
Background Region Privileged accesses only + MPU Enabled during hard fault, NMI and FAULTMASK handlers

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the control mode of the MPU (in case MPU USED) during hard fault, NMI, FAULTMASK and privileged access to the default memory

RefParameter.Name: Enable_Spec
RefParameter.Description: Enable/Disable MPU Region Configurations

RefParameter.Name: Enable_S
RefParameter.Description: Enable/Disable MPU Region Configurations

RefParameter.Name: Enable
RefParameter.Description: Enable/Disable MPU Region Configurations

RefParameter.Name: BaseAddress_S
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the base address of the region to protect:
* The base address is aligned to the size of the region.For example, a 64 KB region must be aligned on a multiple of 64 KB, for example, at 0x00010000 or 0x00020000.

RefParameter.Name: BaseAddress
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the base address of the region to protect:
* The base address is aligned to the size of the region.For example, a 64 KB region must be aligned on a multiple of 64 KB, for example, at 0x00010000 or 0x00020000.

RefParameter.Name: BaseAddress_Spec
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the base address of the region to protect:
* The base address is aligned to the size of the region.For example, a 64 KB region must be aligned on a multiple of 64 KB, for example, at 0x00010000 or 0x00020000.

RefParameter.Name: Size
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the size of the region to protect:
* For Region size 32B, 64B and 128B SubRegion Disable in not available

RefParameter.Name: Size_Spec
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the size of the region to protect:
* For Region size 32B, 64B and 128B SubRegion Disable in not available

RefParameter.Name: Size_S
RefParameter.Description:
Specifies the size of the region to protect:
* For Region size 32B, 64B and 128B SubRegion Disable in not available

RefParameter.Name: SubRegionDisable
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of the subregion protection to disable

RefParameter.Name: SubRegionDisable_Spec
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of the subregion protection to disable

RefParameter.Name: SubRegionDisable_S
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the number of the subregion protection to disable

RefParameter.Name: TypeExtField_Spec
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the TEX field level

RefParameter.Name: TypeExtField_S
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the TEX field level

RefParameter.Name: TypeExtField
RefParameter.Description: Specifies the TEX field level

RefParameter.Name: AccessPermission_Spec

PossibleValue.Comment: Privileged READS\WRITES Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions
Privileged READS Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the region access permission type

RefParameter.Name: AccessPermission_S

PossibleValue.Comment: Privileged READS\WRITES Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions
Privileged READS Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the region access permission type

RefParameter.Name: AccessPermission

PossibleValue.Comment: Privileged READS\WRITES Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions
Privileged READS Permissions + Unprivileged READS Permissions

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the region access permission type

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the instruction access status

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the instruction access status

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the instruction access status

RefParameter.Description: Specifies the cacheable status of the region protected
